dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Ah, não...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Is everything ok?
dialogue.translation: Tá tudo bem?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: No! We've hit some kind of interference...
dialogue.translation: Não! Atingimos algum tipo de interferência...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Something's wrong! We're going to crash!
dialogue.translation: Alguma coisa tá errada! Vamos bater!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ah, não!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Everyone off the ship!
dialogue.translation: Todos pra fora da nave!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This shouldn't be happening!
dialogue.translation: Isso não devia estar acontecendo!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Phew! That was scary!
dialogue.translation: Ufa! Que assustador!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: At least we all escaped, right guys?
dialogue.translation: Pelo menos todos nós escapamos, certo, pessoal?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.translation: ... pessoal?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder why the ship teleported me here alone?
dialogue.translation: Por que será que a nave me teletransportou pra cá sozinho?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope everyone else got out ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que todos tenham saído bem...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Violet! Is that you?
dialogue.translation: Violeta! É você?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Capitão! Você tá bem!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Something has gone horribly wrong with the ship's teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Alguma coisa deu terrivelmente errado com o teletransportador da nave!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think everyone has been teleported away randomly! They could be anywhere!
dialogue.translation: Acho que todos foram teletransportados ao acaso! Podem estar em qualquer lugar!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ah, não!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm on the ship - it's damaged badly, but it's still intact!
dialogue.translation: Eu tô na nave - ela tá muito danificada, mas ainda tá intacta!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Where are you, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Cadê você, Capitão?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I'm on some sort of space station... It seems pretty modern...
dialogue.translation: Em algum tipo de estação espacial... parece bem moderna...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There seems to be some sort of interference in this dimension...
dialogue.translation: Parece ter algum tipo de interferência nesta dimensão...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm broadcasting the coordinates of the ship to you now.
dialogue.translation: Eu tô transmitindo as coordenadas da nave pra você agora.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I can't teleport you back, but...
dialogue.translation: Não posso te teletransportar de volta, mas...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If YOU can find a teleporter anywhere nearby, you should be able to teleport back to me!
dialogue.translation: Se VOCÊ achar um teletransportador por perto, vai poder se teletransportar de volta pra mim!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll try to find one!
dialogue.translation: Ok! Vou tentar encontrar um!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Good luck, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Boa sorte, Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll keep trying to find the rest of the crew...
dialogue.translation: Vou continuar tentando encontrar o resto da equipe...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if no trinkets found yet

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ohh! I wonder what that is?
dialogue.translation: Ahh! O que será que é isso?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Eu não devo precisar disso, mas pode ser bom levar pra estudar na nave...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if other trinket already found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh! It's another one of those shiny things!
dialogue.translation: Olha! Mais uma daquelas coisas brilhantes!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Eu não devo precisar disso, mas pode ser bom levar pra estudar na nave...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: A teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Um teletransportador!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I can get back to the ship with this!
dialogue.translation: Eu posso voltar pra nave com isso!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.translation: Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, Doctor - have you any idea what caused the crash?
dialogue.translation: Então, Doutora, alguma ideia do que causou o acidente?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's some sort of bizarre signal here that's interfering with our equipment...
dialogue.translation: Tem algum tipo de sinal bizarro aqui interferindo em nosso equipamento...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It caused the ship to lose its quantum position, collapsing us into this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Isso fez a nave perder sua posição quântica e nos fez vir parar nesta dimensão!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ah, não!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: But I think we should be able to fix the ship and get out of here...
dialogue.translation: Mas acho que nós vamos conseguir consertar a nave e sair daqui...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... as long as we can find the rest of the crew.
dialogue.translation: ... contanto que a gente possa encontrar o resto da equipe.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We really don't know anything about this place...
dialogue.translation: A gente não sabe nada mesmo sobre este lugar...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Our friends could be anywhere - they could be lost, or in danger!
dialogue.translation: Nossos amigos podem estar em qualquer lugar - eles podem estar perdidos ou em perigo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Can they teleport back here?
dialogue.translation: Podem se teletransportar de volta pra cá?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Not unless they find some way to communicate with us!
dialogue.translation: Só se eles encontrarem uma maneira de se comunicar com a gente!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We can't pick up their signal and they can't teleport here unless they know where the ship is...
dialogue.translation: Não podemos captar o sinal deles e eles não podem se teletransportar pra cá a menos que saibam onde tá a nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So what do we do?
dialogue.translation: Então, o que fazemos?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We need to find them! Head out into the dimension and look for anywhere they might have ended up...
dialogue.translation: Precisamos encontrá-los! Dirija-se pra dimensão e procure qualquer lugar onde eles possam ter parado...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! Where do we start?
dialogue.translation: Ok! Por onde começamos?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Well, I've been trying to find them with the ship's scanners!
dialogue.translation: Bom, tenho tentado encontrá-los com os escaneadores da nave!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It's not working, but I did find something...
dialogue.translation: Não tá funcionando, mas encontrei alguma coisa...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: These points show up on our scans as having high energy patterns!
dialogue.translation: Esses pontos aparecem em nossas varreduras com padrões de alta energia!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's a good chance they're teleporters - which means they're probably built near something important...
dialogue.translation: Há uma boa chance de serem teletransportadores - o que significa que devem ter sido construídos perto de alguma coisa importante...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: They could be a very good place to start looking.
dialogue.translation: Eles podem ser um bom lugar pra começar a procurar.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll head out and see what I can find!
dialogue.translation: Ok! Vou sair e ver o que encontro!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Vou estar aqui se precisar de ajuda!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Vou estar aqui se precisar de ajuda!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed, Doctor.
dialogue.translation: Eu tô me sentindo um pouco sobrecarregado, Doutora.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where do I begin?
dialogue.translation: Por onde começo?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press ENTER to check where you are on the map!
dialogue.translation: Lembre-se: você pode apertar ENTER para verificar onde você está no mapa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press {b_map} to check where you are on the map!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look for areas where the rest of the crew might be...
dialogue.translation: Procure áreas onde o resto da equipe pode estar...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you get lost, you can get back to the ship from any teleporter.
dialogue.translation: Se você se perder, pode voltar para a nave a partir de qualquer teletransportador.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: And don't worry! We'll find everyone!
dialogue.translation: E não se preocupa! Vamos encontrar todos!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: Vai ficar tudo bem!

cutscene.explanation: only one player string is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Você tá bem, Capitão?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Victoria, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Eu tô preocupado com Victoria, Doutora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vitellary, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Eu tô preocupado com o Vitelário, Doutora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Verdigris, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Eu tô preocupado com Verdete, Doutora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vermilion, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Eu tô preocupado com o Vermelhão, Doutora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about you, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Eu tô preocupada com você, Doutora!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh - well, don't worry, they'll show up!
dialogue.translation: Ah - bom, não se preocupa, eles vão aparecer!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Here! Have a lollipop!
dialogue.translation: Aqui! Toma, um pirulito!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store anything I find out there...
dialogue.translation: Este parece ser um bom lugar pra guardar qualquer coisa que eu encontrar por aí...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: Victoria adora estudar as coisas interessantes que encontramos em nossas aventuras!

cutscene.explanation: if at least one trinket found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store those shiny things.
dialogue.translation: Este parece ser um bom lugar pra guardar essas coisas brilhantes.

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: Victoria adora estudar as coisas interessantes que encontramos em nossas aventuras!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que ela esteja bem...

cutscene.explanation: nuance: `she's BACK on the ship` means more `she's home` and not `she has returned to the ship`. She has never left the ship

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been so worried!
dialogue.translation: Capitão! Ando tão preocupada!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Chefe Verdete! Você tá bem!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I've been trying to get out, but I keep going around in circles...
dialogue.translation: Tô tentando sair, mas continuo andando em círculos...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I've come from the ship. I'm here to teleport you back to it.
dialogue.translation: Eu vim da nave. Tô aqui pra te teletransportar de volta pra lá.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Is everyone else alright? Is Violet...
dialogue.translation: Todos os outros estão bem? A Violeta tá...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine - she's back on the ship!
dialogue.translation: Ela tá bem - tá de volta à nave!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh! Great - Let's get going, then!
dialogue.translation: Ah! Ótimo - vamos indo, então!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! Captain! Are you stuck here too?
dialogue.translation: Ah, não! Capitão! Você tá preso aqui, também?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's ok - I'm here to rescue you!
dialogue.translation: Tá tudo bem - eu tô aqui pra te resgatar!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let me explain everything...
dialogue.translation: Deixa eu explicar tudo...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? I didn't understand any of that!
dialogue.translation: O quê? Eu não entendi nada!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... well, don't worry.
dialogue.translation: Ah... bom, não se preocupa.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! Everything will be alright!
dialogue.translation: Me segue! Vai ficar tudo bem!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Sniff... Really?
dialogue.translation: Buá... sério?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Ok then!
dialogue.translation: Então tá!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.translation: Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Am I ever glad to see you! I thought I was the only one to escape the ship...
dialogue.translation: Eu tô tão feliz em te ver! Pensei que só eu tinha conseguido escapar da nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion! I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: Vermelhão! Eu sabia que você ficaria bem!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: So, what's the situation?
dialogue.translation: Então, qual é a situação?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I see! Well, we'd better get back then.
dialogue.translation: Entendi! Bom, então é melhor a gente voltar.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: There's a teleporter in the next room.
dialogue.translation: Tem um teletransportador na próxima sala.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, Viridian! You got off the ship alright too?
dialogue.translation: Ah, Viridiano! Você saiu da nave bem também?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's good to see you're alright, Professor!
dialogue.translation: Muito bom te ver bem, Professor!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Is the ship ok?
dialogue.translation: A nave está funcionando?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's badly damaged, but Violet's been working on fixing it.
dialogue.translation: Tá muito danificada, mas a Violeta tá trabalhando pra consertá-la.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We could really use your help...
dialogue.translation: Sua ajuda viria mesmo a calhar...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, of course!
dialogue.translation: Ah, claro!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: The background interference in this dimension prevented the ship from finding a teleporter when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: A interferência de fundo nesta dimensão impediu que a nave encontrasse um teletransportador quando caímos!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We've all been teleported to different locations!
dialogue.translation: Nós fomos todos teletransportados pra locais diferentes!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Er, that sounds about right!
dialogue.translation: É, parece que sim!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's get back to the ship, then!
dialogue.translation: Vamos voltar pra nave, então!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Depois de você, Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Are you ok?
dialogue.translation: Capitão! Você está bem?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm ok... this... this isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Eu tô bem... isso... essa não é a nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Onde a gente tá?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Something's gone wrong... We should look for a way back!
dialogue.translation: Alguma coisa deu errado... precisamos procurar um caminho de volta!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! I'll help you!
dialogue.translation: Me segue! Vou te ajudar!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Promise you won't leave without me!
dialogue.translation: Promete que não vai embora sem mim!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I promise! Don't worry!
dialogue.translation: Eu prometo! Não se preocupa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you ok down there, Doctor?
dialogue.translation: Você tá bem aí, Doutora?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wanna go home!
dialogue.translation: Eu quero ir pra casa!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Where are we? How did we even get here?
dialogue.translation: Onde estamos? Como chegamos aqui?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Well, Violet did say that the interference in the dimension we crashed in was causing problems with the teleporters...
dialogue.translation: Olha, a Violeta disse que a interferência na dimensão em que caímos estava causando problemas com os teletransportadores...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I guess something went wrong...
dialogue.translation: Acho que alguma coisa deu errado...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: But if we can find another teleporter, I think we can get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Mas se a gente encontrar outro teletransportador, acho que dá pra voltar pra nave!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Buá...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Captain! Wait for me!
dialogue.translation: Capitão! Capitão! Me espere!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Please don't leave me behind! I don't mean to be a burden!
dialogue.translation: Por favor, não me deixe pra trás! Não quero ser um fardo!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm scared!
dialogue.translation: Estou com medo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... don't worry Victoria, I'll look after you!
dialogue.translation: Ah... não se preocupa, Victoria, eu vou cuidar de você!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're never going to get out of here, are we?
dialogue.translation: Nunca mais vamos sair daqui, não é?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I.. I don't know...
dialogue.translation: Eu.. eu não sei...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know where we are or how we're going to get out...
dialogue.translation: Não sei onde estamos nem como vamos sair...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're going to be lost forever!
dialogue.translation: Vamos ficar perdidos pra sempre!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok, come on... Things aren't that bad.
dialogue.translation: Ah, deixa disso... as coisas não estão tão ruins assim.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I have a feeling that we're nearly home!
dialogue.translation: Tenho a sensação de que estamos quase em casa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We can't be too far from another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Não devemos estar muito longe de outro teletransportador!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope you're right, captain...
dialogue.translation: Espero que esteja certo, Capitão...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! You were right! It's a teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Capitão! Você estava certo! É um teletransportador!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Phew! You had me worried for a while there... I thought we were never going to find one.
dialogue.translation: Ufa! Por um momento, você me deixou preocupado... achei que nunca íamos encontrar um.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? Really?
dialogue.translation: O quê? Sério?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Anyway, let's go back to the ship.
dialogue.translation: Enfim, vamos voltar pra nave.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Huh? This isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Hã? Esta não é a nave...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! What's going on?
dialogue.translation: Capitão! O que tá acontecendo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I... I don't know!
dialogue.translation: Eu... eu não sei!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Onde a gente tá?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Uh oh, this isn't good... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Ahm, isso não é bom... Algo deve ter dado errado com o teletransportador!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok... no need to panic!
dialogue.translation: Ok... sem pânico!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's look for another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Vamos procurar outro teletransportador!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go this way!
dialogue.translation: Vamos por aqui!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Depois de você, capitão!

cutscene.explanation: just like in rescuegreen, `Violet is back on the ship` does not mean she was ever off the ship and has *returned* to it. Or maybe Verdigris thinks Violet was warped off the ship as well just like him and she *has* made her way back to the ship?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So Violet's back on the ship? She's really ok?
dialogue.translation: Então Violeta já tá na nave? Ela tá bem mesmo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine! She helped me find my way back!
dialogue.translation: Ela tá bem! Ela me ajudou a encontrar meu caminho de volta!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh, phew! I was worried about her.
dialogue.translation: Ufa! Eu tava preocupado com ela.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain, I have a secret...
dialogue.translation: Capitão, preciso te contar um segredo...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I really like Violet!
dialogue.translation: Eu gosto muito da Violeta!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is that so?
dialogue.translation: É mesmo?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Please promise you won't tell her!
dialogue.translation: Por favor, promete que não vai contar a ela!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hey again!
dialogue.translation: Olá de novo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: Olá!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok?
dialogue.translation: Você tá bem?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think so! I really hope we can find a way back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Acho que sim! Espero mesmo que a gente encontre um caminho de volta pra nave...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So, about Violet...
dialogue.translation: Então, sobre a Violeta...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um, yeah?
dialogue.translation: Ahm, pois não?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Do you have any advice?
dialogue.translation: Algum conselho?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um... you should... be yourself!
dialogue.translation: Hmm... você devia... ser você mesmo!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Thanks Captain!
dialogue.translation: Valeu, Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, do you think you'll be able to fix the ship?
dialogue.translation: Então, você acha que vai conseguir consertar a nave?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Depends on how bad it is... I think so, though!
dialogue.translation: Depende de como ela tá ruim... mas acho que sim!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It's not very hard, really. The basic dimensional warping engine design is pretty simple, and if we can get that working we shouldn't have any trouble getting home.
dialogue.translation: Não é muito difícil, não. O projeto básico do motor de deformação dimensional é bem simples e, se a gente conseguir fazer funcionar, não vamos ter problemas pra chegar em casa.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh! Good!
dialogue.translation: Ah! Que bom!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Finally! A teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Até que enfim! Um teletransportador!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I was getting worried we wouldn't find one...
dialogue.translation: Eu tava ficando preocupado que a gente não ia encontrar um...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's head back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Vamos voltar pra nave!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Wow! Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Uau! Onde a gente tá?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This... isn't right... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Isso... não tá certo... Alguma coisa deve ter dado errado com o teletransportador!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Oh well... We can work it out when we get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: É... vamos resolver isso ao voltar pra nave!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's go exploring!
dialogue.translation: Vamos explorar!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok then!
dialogue.translation: Então tá!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!
dialogue.translation: Me segue!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Aye aye, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Aye, aye, Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Viridian... how did the crash happen, exactly?
dialogue.translation: Ei, Viridiano... como exatamente aconteceu o acidente?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh, I don't really know - some sort of interference...
dialogue.translation: Ah, de verdade, eu não sei - algum tipo de interferência...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...or something sciencey like that. It's not really my area.
dialogue.translation: ... ou alguma coisa científica da vida. Não é bem a minha área.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Ah! Well, do you think we'll be able to fix the ship and go home?
dialogue.translation: Ah! Você acha que vamos conseguir consertar a nave e voltar pra casa?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Of course! Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: Claro! Vai ficar tudo bem!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hi again! You doing ok?
dialogue.translation: Oi de novo! Você tá bem?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I think so! But I really want to get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Eu acho que sim! Mas quero mesmo voltar pra nave...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll be ok! If we can find a teleporter somewhere we should be able to get back!
dialogue.translation: Vamos ficar bem! Se conseguirmos encontrar um teletransportador em algum lugar, vai dar pra voltar!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Are we there yet?
dialogue.translation: Já chegamos?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're getting closer, I think...
dialogue.translation: Estamos perto, acho...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I hope...
dialogue.translation: Espero que sim...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I wonder where we are, anyway?
dialogue.translation: Onde a gente tá, afinal?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This seems different from that dimension we crashed in, somehow...
dialogue.translation: Isso parece diferente daquela dimensão em que caímos, de alguma forma...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I dunno... But we must be close to a teleporter by now...
dialogue.translation: Não sei... mas já devemos estar perto de um teletransportador...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're there!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: See? I told you! Let's get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Viu? Eu te disse! Vamos voltar pra nave!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oooh! This is interesting...
dialogue.translation: Aaah! Que interessante...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you been here before?
dialogue.translation: Capitão! Você já esteve aqui antes?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Where are we?
dialogue.translation: O quê? Onde a gente tá?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I suspect something deflected our teleporter transmission! This is somewhere new...
dialogue.translation: Suspeito que alguma coisa desviou nossa transmissão do teleportador! Este é um lugar novo...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ah, não!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We should try to find a teleporter and get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Vamos tentar achar um teletransportador e voltar pra nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!
dialogue.translation: Me segue!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Right behind you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Bem atrás de você, Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What do you make of all this, Professor?
dialogue.translation: O que você acha de tudo isso, Professor?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm guessing this dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash!
dialogue.translation: Suponho que esta dimensão tenha alguma coisa a ver com a interferência que nos fez bater!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the cause of it here?
dialogue.translation: Talvez encontremos a causa disso aqui?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh wow! Really?
dialogue.translation: Uau! Sério?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Well, it's just a guess. I'll need to get back to the ship before I can do any real tests...
dialogue.translation: Hm, é só um palpite. Vou precisar voltar pra nave antes de fazer qualquer teste real...

cutscene.explanation: the split paths merge, and Vitellary sees a checkpoint

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ohh! What was that?
dialogue.translation: Ahh! O que é que foi isso?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What was what?
dialogue.translation: O que foi o quê?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That big... C thing! I wonder what it does?
dialogue.translation: Aquela coisa com um... C enorme! O que será que isso faz?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Em... I don't really know how to answer that question...
dialogue.translation: Hm... eu nem imagino como responder a essa pergunta...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's probably best not to acknowledge that it's there at all.
dialogue.translation: Acho que é melhor a gente fingir que aquilo não tá lá.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we should take it back to the ship to study it?
dialogue.translation: Talvez devêssemos levá-lo de volta pra estudar na nave?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We really shouldn't think about it too much... Let's keep moving!
dialogue.translation: Sério, acho que a gente não deveria pensar muito sobre isso... Vamos continuar!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: You know, there's something really odd about this dimension...
dialogue.translation: Olha, tem alguma coisa muito estranha nessa dimensão...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: É?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We shouldn't really be able to move between dimensions with a regular teleporter...
dialogue.translation: Não devíamos conseguir nos mover entre as dimensões com um teletransportador normal...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe this isn't a proper dimension at all?
dialogue.translation: Talvez esta não seja uma dimensão comum?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe it's some kind of polar dimension? Something artificially created for some reason?
dialogue.translation: Talvez seja algum tipo de dimensão polar? Algo criado artificialmente por algum motivo?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I can't wait to get back to the ship. I have a lot of tests to run!
dialogue.translation: Mal posso esperar pra voltar à nave. Tenho muitos testes pra fazer!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder if there's anything else in this dimension worth exploring?
dialogue.translation: Será que tem mais alguma coisa nesta dimensão que valha a pena explorar?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe... but we should probably just focus on finding the rest of the crew for now...
dialogue.translation: Talvez... mas acho que a gente devia se concentrar em encontrar o resto da equipe por enquanto...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: At last!
dialogue.translation: Até que enfim!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's go back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Vamos voltar pra nave!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Ah, não...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: De novo, não!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Victoria? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Victoria? Cadê você?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Espera! Eu vou te salvar!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Verdigris? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Verdete? Cadê você?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Espera! Eu vou te salvar!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Vermelhão? Cadê você?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Espera! Eu vou te salvar!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vitellary? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Vitelário? Cadê você?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.translation: Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Espera! Eu vou te salvar!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I think I'm going to be sick...
dialogue.translation: Acho que eu vou passar mal...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Eu tô tonto...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Phew! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Ufa! Você tá bem!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Eu tô tonto...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Again! Let's go again!
dialogue.translation: De novo! E lá vamos nós de novo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Eu tô tonto...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That was interesting, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: Que interessante, não?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Eu tô tonto...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... I hope Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: ... Espero que Verdete esteja bem.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you can find him, he'd be a a big help fixing the ship!
dialogue.translation: Se você puder encontrá-lo, ele será uma grande ajuda pra consertar a nave!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris is so brave and ever so smart!
dialogue.translation: Chefe Verdete é tão corajoso e tão inteligente!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Bem-vindo de volta, Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think Victoria is quite happy to be back on the ship.
dialogue.translation: Acho que Victoria tá muito feliz por estar de volta à nave.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: She really doesn't like adventuring. She gets very homesick!
dialogue.translation: Ela não gosta nadinha de aventura. Fica morrendo de saudade de casa!

cutscene.explanation: only one of the last 6 strings is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Vermilion called in to say hello!
dialogue.translation: Vermelhão ligou pra mandar um oi!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Ele tá morrendo de ansiedade pra ajudá-lo a encontrar o resto da equipe!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Victoria!
dialogue.translation: Ele tá morrendo de ansiedade pra ajudá-lo a encontrar Victoria!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vitellary!
dialogue.translation: Ele tá morrendo de ansiedade pra ajudá-lo a encontrar Vitelário!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: Ele tá morrendo de ansiedade pra ajudá-lo a encontrar Verdete!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vermilion!
dialogue.translation: Ele tá morrendo de ansiedade pra ajudá-lo a encontrar Vermelhão!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find you!
dialogue.translation: Ele tá morrendo de ansiedade pra ajudá-lo a se encontrar!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You found Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: Capitão! Você encontrou Verdete!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Thank you so much!
dialogue.translation: Muito obrigado!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm glad Professor Vitellary is ok!
dialogue.translation: Que bom que o Professor Vitelário tá bem!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He had lots of questions for me about this dimension.
dialogue.translation: Ele me fez um monte de perguntas sobre essa dimensão.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's already gotten to work with his research!
dialogue.translation: Ele já começou a trabalhar em sua pesquisa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange happened when we teleported back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Doutora, aconteceu alguma coisa estranha quando nos teletransportamos de volta pra nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We got lost in another dimension!
dialogue.translation: Nos perdemos em outra dimensão!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ah, não!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Talvez essa dimensão tenha alguma coisa a ver com a interferência que nos fez parar aqui?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll look into it...
dialogue.translation: Vou estudar essa hipótese...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor! Doctor! It happened again!
dialogue.translation: Doutora! Doutora! Aconteceu de novo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The teleporter brought us to that weird dimension...
dialogue.translation: O teletransportador nos trouxe pra aquela dimensão estranha...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Hmm, com certeza tem alguma coisa estranha acontecendo...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Se pelo menos a gente conseguisse encontrar a fonte dessa interferência!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange has been happening when we teleport back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Doutora, tá acontecendo alguma coisa estranha quando nos teletransportamos de volta pra nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We keep getting brought to another weird dimension!
dialogue.translation: Continuamos sendo levados pra outra dimensão estranha!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ah, não!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Talvez essa dimensão tenha alguma coisa a ver com a interferência que nos fez parar aqui?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Hmm, com certeza tem alguma coisa estranha acontecendo...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Se pelo menos a gente conseguisse encontrar a fonte dessa interferência!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hey Captain! Now that you've turned off the source of the interference, we can warp everyone back to the ship instantly, if we need to!
dialogue.translation: Ei, Capitão! Agora que você desligou a fonte da interferência, se precisar dá pra teletransportar todos de volta pra nave na hora!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Any time you want to come back to the ship, just select the new SHIP option in your menu!
dialogue.translation: Sempre que quiser voltar para nave, basta selecionar a nova opção NAVE no seu menu!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm an engineer!
dialogue.translation: Eu sou engenheiro!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think I can get this ship moving again, but it's going to take a while...
dialogue.translation: Acho que consigo colocar essa nave em movimento de novo, mas vai demorar um pouco...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Victoria mentioned something about a lab? I wonder if she found anything down there?
dialogue.translation: Victoria mencionou alguma coisa sobre um laboratório? Será que ela encontrou alguma coisa lá embaixo?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Vermilion's back! Yey!
dialogue.translation: O Vermelhão tá de volta! Viva!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The Professor had lots of questions about this dimension for me...
dialogue.translation: O Professor me fez um monte de perguntas sobre essa dimensão.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: We still don't really know that much, though.
dialogue.translation: Só que ainda não sabemos muito.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Until we work out what's causing that interference, we can't go anywhere.
dialogue.translation: Até a gente descobrir o que tá causando essa interferência, não vai dar pra ir a lugar nenhum.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm so glad that Violet's alright!
dialogue.translation: Eu tô tão feliz que Violeta tá bem!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: That other dimension we ended up in must be related to this one, somehow...
dialogue.translation: Aquela outra dimensão em que caímos deve ter alguma relação com esta...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The antenna's broken! This is going to be very hard to fix...
dialogue.translation: A antena quebrou! Isso vai ser muito difícil de resolver...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It looks like we were warped into solid rock when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: Parece que fomos transformados em rocha sólida quando batemos!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hmm. It's going to be hard to separate from this...
dialogue.translation: Hmm. Vai ser difícil se separar disso...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The ship's all fixed up. We can leave at a moment's notice!
dialogue.translation: A nave tá toda consertada. Podemos sair a qualquer momento!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Don't worry, Sir!
dialogue.translation: Não se preocupa, senhor!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll find a way out of here!
dialogue.translation: Vamos dar um jeito de sair daqui!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I hope Victoria is ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que Victoria esteja bem...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She doesn't handle surprises very well...
dialogue.translation: Ela não lida muito bem com surpresas...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I don't know how we're going to get this ship working again!
dialogue.translation: Não sei como vamos fazer essa nave funcionar de novo!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris would know what to do...
dialogue.translation: Chefe Verdete saberia o que fazer...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the ship to crash here?
dialogue.translation: O que será que fez a nave cair aqui?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's the shame the Professor isn't here, huh? I'm sure he could work it out!
dialogue.translation: É uma pena o Professor não estar aqui, né? Aposto que ele poderia resolver isso!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's great to be back!
dialogue.translation: É ótimo estar de volta!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I can't wait to help you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Mal posso esperar pra ajudá-lo a encontrar o resto da equipe!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It'll be like old times, huh, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Vai ser como nos velhos tempos, hein, Capitão?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's good to have Victoria back with us.
dialogue.translation: É bom ter Victoria de volta com a gente.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She really seems happy to get back to work in her lab!
dialogue.translation: Ela parece feliz de verdade por voltar a trabalhar em seu laboratório!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I think I saw Verdigris working on the outside of the ship!
dialogue.translation: Acho que vi Verdete trabalhando do lado de fora da nave!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: You found Professor Vitellary! All right!
dialogue.translation: Você encontrou o professor Vitelário! Que ótimo!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll have this interference thing worked out in no time now!
dialogue.translation: Vamos resolver essa coisa de interferência em pouco tempo agora!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: That other dimension was really strange, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: Essa outra dimensão era muito estranha, não era?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the teleporter to send us there?
dialogue.translation: O que será que fez o teletransportador nos enviar pra lá?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Ei, Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This way looks a little dangerous...
dialogue.translation: Este caminho parece meio perigoso...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I'm helping!
dialogue.translation: Eu tô ajudando!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Captain!
dialogue.translation: Ei, capitão!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I found something interesting around here - the same warp signature I saw when I landed!
dialogue.translation: Encontrei uma coisa interessante por aqui - a mesma assinatura de teletransporte que vi quando cheguei!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Someone from the ship must be nearby...
dialogue.translation: Alguém da nave deve estar por perto...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This dimension is pretty exciting, isn't it?
dialogue.translation: Que dimensão emocionante, né?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: O que será que vamos encontrar?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any signs of Professor Vitellary?
dialogue.translation: Algum sinal do Professor Vitelário?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, not yet...
dialogue.translation: Sinto muito, ainda não...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope he's ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que ele esteja bem...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thanks so much for saving me, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Muito obrigado por me salvar, Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm so glad to be back!
dialogue.translation: Eu tô tão feliz por estar de volta!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: That lab was so dark and scary! I didn't like it at all...
dialogue.translation: Aquele laboratório era tão escuro e assustador! Não gostei nada disso...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Vitellary's back? I knew you'd find him!
dialogue.translation: Vitelário voltou? Eu sabia que você ia encontrá-lo!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I mean, I admit I was very worried that you wouldn't...
dialogue.translation: Quer dizer, admito que eu tava preocupada que você não ia conseguir...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: or that something might have happened to him...
dialogue.translation: ou que alguma coisa podia ter acontecido com ele...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: buá...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor Victoria? He's ok!
dialogue.translation: Doutora Victoria? Ele tá bem!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh! Sorry! I was just thinking about what if he wasn't?
dialogue.translation: Ah! Desculpa! Eu só tava pensando o que ia acontecer se ele não estivesse?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thank you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Obrigada, Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You found Vermilion! Great!
dialogue.translation: Você encontrou o Vermelhão! Ótimo!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wish he wasn't so reckless!
dialogue.translation: Eu gostaria que ele não fosse tão imprudente!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: He'll get himself into trouble...
dialogue.translation: Ele vai se meter em encrenca...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Verdigris is ok! Violet will be so happy!
dialogue.translation: Verdete tá bem! Violeta vai ficar tão feliz!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm happy!
dialogue.translation: Eu tô feliz!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Though I was very worried...
dialogue.translation: Se bem que eu tava muito preocupada...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Why did the teleporter send us to that scary dimension?
dialogue.translation: Por que o teleportador nos mandou pra aquela dimensão assustadora?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What happened?
dialogue.translation: O que aconteceu?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know, Doctor...
dialogue.translation: Não sei, Doutora...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Por quê?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Ei, Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Are you going to try and find the rest of these shiny things?
dialogue.translation: Você vai tentar encontrar o resto dessas coisas brilhantes?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Hey Captain, I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: Ei, Capitão, encontrei isso naquele laboratório...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: Alguma ideia do que isso faz?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, I don't know!
dialogue.translation: Desculpe, não faço ideia!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: They seem important, though...
dialogue.translation: Se bem que eles parecem importantes...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe something will happen if we find them all?
dialogue.translation: Será que, se encontrarmos todos eles, acontece alguma coisa?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: Capitão! Vem aqui dar uma olhada no que eu andei trabalhando!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It looks like these shiny things are giving off a strange energy reading!
dialogue.translation: Parece que essas coisas brilhantes estão emitindo uma leitura de energia estranha!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Então eu analisei...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: Capitão! Vem aqui dar uma olhada no que eu andei trabalhando!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: Achei isso naquele laboratório...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It seemed to be giving off a weird energy reading...
dialogue.translation: Parecia estar emitindo uma leitura de energia estranha...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Então eu analisei...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and I was able to find more of them with the ship's scanner!
dialogue.translation: ... e consegui encontrar mais deles com o escaneador da nave!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: If you get a chance, it might be worth finding the rest of them!
dialogue.translation: Se você tiver a oportunidade, pode valer a pena encontrar o resto deles!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Don't put yourself in any danger, though!
dialogue.translation: Mas não se coloque em perigo!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...but it looks like you've already found all of them in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: ...mas parece que você já encontrou todos eles nesta dimensão!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: Hm? Sério?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah, well done! That can't have been easy!
dialogue.translation: Sim, bom trabalho! Não deve ter sido fácil!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and they're related. They're all a part of something bigger!
dialogue.translation: ... e eles estão relacionados. Todos são parte de alguma coisa maior!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: Hm? Sério?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah! There seem to be twenty variations of the fundamental energy signature...
dialogue.translation: Sério! Parece haver vinte variações da assinatura de energia fundamental...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Does that mean you've found all of them?
dialogue.translation: Isso significa que você encontrou todos eles?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm making some fascinating discoveries, captain!
dialogue.translation: Estou fazendo descobertas fascinantes, capitão!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This isn't like any other dimension we've been to, Captain.
dialogue.translation: Isto é diferente de qualquer outra dimensão em que estivemos, Capitão.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something strange about this place...
dialogue.translation: Tem alguma coisa estranha nesse lugar...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain, have you noticed that this dimension seems to wrap around?
dialogue.translation: Capitão, reparou que esta dimensão parece se enrolar?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it's strange...
dialogue.translation: Sim, que estranho...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like this dimension is having the same stability problems as our own!
dialogue.translation: Parece que esta dimensão está tendo os mesmos problemas de estabilidade que a nossa!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope we're not the ones causing it...
dialogue.translation: Tomara que não sejamos nós causando isso...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Do you think we might be?
dialogue.translation: O quê? Você acha que pode ser?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: No no... that's very unlikely, really...
dialogue.translation: Não, não... muito improvável, sério...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: My guess is that whoever used to live here was experimenting with ways to stop the dimension from collapsing.
dialogue.translation: Meu palpite é que quem morava aqui estava experimentando maneiras de impedir o colapso da dimensão.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It would explain why they've wrapped the edges...
dialogue.translation: Isso explicaria por que eles conectaram as bordas...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Hey, maybe that's what's causing the interference?
dialogue.translation: Ei, será que é isso que está causando a interferência?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder where the people who used to live here have gone?
dialogue.translation: Aonde foram as pessoas que moravam aqui?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think it's no coincidence that the teleporter was drawn to that dimension...
dialogue.translation: Não é por acaso que o teletransportador foi atraído pra aquela dimensão...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something there. I think it might be causing the interference that's stopping us from leaving...
dialogue.translation: Tem alguma coisa lá. Acho que pode estar causando a interferência que está nos impedindo de sair...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm glad Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: Estou feliz que o Verdete esteja bem.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It'll be a lot easier to find some way out of here now that we can get the ship working again!
dialogue.translation: Vai ser muito mais fácil encontrar uma saída daqui agora que já conseguimos fazer a nave funcionar!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, you've found Doctor Victoria? Excellent!
dialogue.translation: Ah, você encontrou a Doutora Victoria? Excelente!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I have lots of questions for her!
dialogue.translation: Tinha várias perguntas para fazer a ela!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Vermilion says that he was trapped in some sort of tunnel?
dialogue.translation: O Vermelhão disse que estava preso em algum tipo de túnel?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it just seemed to keep going and going...
dialogue.translation: Sim, parecia continuar indo e indo...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Interesting... I wonder why it was built?
dialogue.translation: Interessante... Por que será que foi construído?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's good to be back!
dialogue.translation: É bom estar de volta!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've got so much work to catch up on...
dialogue.translation: Tenho tanto trabalho pra pôr em dia...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I know it's probably a little dangerous to stay here now that this dimension is collapsing...
dialogue.translation: Eu sei que deve ser um tanto perigoso ficar aqui agora que esta dimensão está entrando em colapso...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...but it's so rare to find somewhere this interesting!
dialogue.translation: ... mas é tão raro encontrar um lugar tão interessante!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the answers to our own problems here?
dialogue.translation: Talvez encontremos as respostas aos nossos próprios problemas aqui?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been meaning to give this to you...
dialogue.translation: Capitão! Estava querendo te dar isso...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Professor! Where did you find this?
dialogue.translation: Professor! Onde você achou isso?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh, it was just lying around that space station.
dialogue.translation: Ah, estava jogado naquela estação espacial.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's a pity Doctor Victoria isn't here, she loves studying that sort of thing...
dialogue.translation: É uma pena que a Doutora Victoria não esteja aqui, ela adora estudar esse tipo de coisa...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: Alguma ideia do que isso faz?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Nope! But it is giving off a strange energy reading...
dialogue.translation: Não! Mas está emitindo uma leitura de energia estranha...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...so I used the ship's scanner to find more of them!
dialogue.translation: ... então usei o escaneador da nave pra encontrar mais deles!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...Please don't let them distract you from finding Victoria, though!
dialogue.translation: ... Mas, por favor, não deixa eles te distraírem de encontrar Victoria!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que ela esteja bem...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Can't seem to detect any more of them nearby, though.
dialogue.translation: Se bem que não consigo detectar mais nenhum deles por perto.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe you've found them all?
dialogue.translation: Será que você encontrou todos eles?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back!
dialogue.translation: Bem-vindo de volta!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Um, where's Captain Viridian?
dialogue.translation: Hm, cadê o Capitão Viridiano?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ... Hello?
dialogue.translation: ... Olá?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is anyone there?
dialogue.translation: Tem alguém aí?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
* DIMENSIONAL STABILITY GENERATOR *
[ Currently Generating ] Maximum Stability
[ Status ] Online
READY _
dialogue.translation:
GERADOR DE ESTABILIDADE DIMENSIONAL
[ Gerando Atualmente ] Estabilidade Máxima
[ Situação ] Ativado
PRONTO _

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Aha! This must be what's causing the interference!
dialogue.translation: Ah! Deve ser isso que tá causando a interferência!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder if I can turn it off?
dialogue.translation: Será que eu consigo desligá-lo?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: WARNING: Disabling the Dimensional Stability Generator may lead to instability! Are you sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation: ATENÇÃO: desativar o Gerador de Estabilidade Dimensional pode levar à instabilidade! Quer mesmo executar esta ação?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
Seriously! The whole dimension could collapse! Just think about this for a minute!
Are you really sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation:
É sério! Toda a dimensão pode entrar em colapso! Pense um pouco nisso!
Quer mesmo fazer isso?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
DIMENSIONAL STABILISER OFFLINE
dialogue.translation:
-= ATENÇÃO =-
ESTABILIZADOR DIMENSIONAL DESATIVADO

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Ah, não...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Any moment now...
dialogue.translation: A qualquer momento...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: Olá!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.translation: Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.translation: Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.translation: Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.translation: Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Capitão!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You're alright!
dialogue.translation: Você tá bem!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: Eu sabia que você ia ficar bem!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We were very worried when you didn't come back...
dialogue.translation: Ficamos muito preocupados quando você não voltou...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: ...but when you turned off the source of the interference...
dialogue.translation: ... mas quando você desligou a fonte da interferência...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...we were able to find you with the ship's scanners...
dialogue.translation: ... conseguimos te encontrar com os escaneadores da nave...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...and teleport you back on board!
dialogue.translation: ... e te teletransportar de volta a bordo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That was lucky!
dialogue.translation: Foi pura sorte!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Thanks guys!
dialogue.translation: Obrigado, pessoal!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...it looks like this dimension is starting to destabilise, just like our own...
dialogue.translation: ... parece que esta dimensão está começando a se desestabilizar, assim como a nossa...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...we can stay and explore for a little longer, but...
dialogue.translation: ... podemos ficar e explorar um pouco mais, mas...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...eventually, it'll collapse completely.
dialogue.translation: ... no fim, ela vai entrar em colapso por completo.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: There's no telling exactly how long we have here. But the ship's fixed, so...
dialogue.translation: Não tem como dizer ao certo quanto tempo ainda temos aqui. Como a nave tá consertada...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...as soon as we're ready, we can go home!
dialogue.translation: ... assim que estivermos prontos, podemos ir pra casa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What now, Captain?
dialogue.translation: E agora, Capitão?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's find a way to save this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Vamos encontrar um jeito de salvar esta dimensão!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: And a way to save our home dimension too!
dialogue.translation: E uma forma de salvar a nossa dimensão também!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The answer is out there, somewhere!
dialogue.translation: A resposta tá lá fora, em algum lugar!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Wow! You found all of them!
dialogue.translation: Uau! Você encontrou todos eles!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Really? Great!
dialogue.translation: Sério? Ótimo!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'll run some tests and see if I can work out what they're for...
dialogue.translation: Vou fazer uns testes e ver se descubro pra que servem...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That... that didn't sound good...
dialogue.translation: Isso... isso não parece bom...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ah, não!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: De novo, não!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Wait! It's stopped!
dialogue.translation: Espera! Tá parado!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: This is where we were storing those shiny things? What happened?
dialogue.translation: Era aqui que a gente estava guardando aquelas coisas brilhantes? O que aconteceu?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We were just playing with them, and...
dialogue.translation: Estávamos só mexendo nelas, e...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...they suddenly exploded!
dialogue.translation: ... elas explodiram do nada!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: But look what they made! Is that a teleporter?
dialogue.translation: Mas veja o que elas criaram! Isso é um teletransportador?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think so, but...
dialogue.translation: Acho que sim, mas...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've never seen a teleporter like that before...
dialogue.translation: Nunca vi um teletransportador assim antes...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We should investigate!
dialogue.translation: Precisamos investigar!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What do you think, Captain?
dialogue.translation: O que você acha, Capitão?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Should we find out where it leads?
dialogue.translation: A gente precisa descobrir aonde isso leva?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! We're trapped!
dialogue.translation: Ah, não! Estamos presos!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh dear...
dialogue.translation: Minha nossa...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hmm... how should we get out of this?
dialogue.translation: Hmm... como devemos sair dessa?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Or, you know... we could have just warped back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Ou... podíamos ter apenas teletransportado de volta pra nave...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Wow! What is this?
dialogue.translation: Uau! O que é isso?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like another laboratory!
dialogue.translation: Parece outro laboratório!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's have a look around!
dialogue.translation: Vamos dar uma olhada!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look at all this research! This is going to be a big help back home!
dialogue.translation: Olha só pra toda essa pesquisa! Vai ser de grande ajuda quando a gente voltar!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I wonder why they abandoned this dimension? They were so close to working out how to fix it...
dialogue.translation: Por que será que eles abandonaram esta dimensão? Estavam tão perto de descobrir como consertar isso...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Maybe we can fix it for them? Maybe they'll come back?
dialogue.translation: De repente, a gente podia consertar isso pra eles? Talvez eles voltem?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: This lab is amazing! The scientists who worked here know a lot more about warp technology than we do!
dialogue.translation: Este laboratório é incrível! Os cientistas que trabalharam aqui sabem muito mais sobre tecnologia de teletransporte do que nós!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you seen this?
dialogue.translation: Capitão! Viu isso?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: With their research and ours, we should be able to stabilise our own dimension!
dialogue.translation: Com as pesquisas deles e as nossas, devemos conseguir estabilizar nossa própria dimensão!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We're saved!
dialogue.translation: Estamos salvos!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Look what I found!
dialogue.translation: Olha o que eu achei!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's pretty hard, I can only last for about 10 seconds...
dialogue.translation: É muito difícil, só consigo segurar por cerca de 10 segundos...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= JUKEBOX =-
Songs will continue to play until you leave the ship.
Collect trinkets to unlock new songs!
dialogue.translation:
-= JUKEBOX =-
As músicas continuarão tocando até você sair da nave.
Colete trecos para desbloquear novas músicas!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 5 Trinkets
Pushing Onwards
dialogue.translation:
PRÓXIMO DESBLOQUEIO: 5 treco
Pushing Onwards

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 8 Trinkets
Positive Force
dialogue.translation:
PRÓXIMO DESBLOQUEIO: 8 trecos
Positive Force

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 10 Trinkets
Presenting VVVVVV
dialogue.translation:
PRÓXIMO DESBLOQUEIO: 10 trecos
Presenting VVVVVV

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 12 Trinkets
Potential for Anything
dialogue.translation:
PRÓXIMO DESBLOQUEIO: 12 trecos
Potential for Anything

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 14 Trinkets
Pressure Cooker
dialogue.translation:
PRÓXIMO DESBLOQUEIO: 14 trecos
Pressure Cooker

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 16 Trinkets
Predestined Fate
dialogue.translation:
PRÓXIMO DESBLOQUEIO: 16 trecos
Predestined Fate

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 18 Trinkets
Popular Potpourri
dialogue.translation:
PRÓXIMO DESBLOQUEIO: 18 trecos
Popular Potpourri

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 20 Trinkets
Pipe Dream
dialogue.translation:
PRÓXIMO DESBLOQUEIO: 20 trecos
Pipe Dream

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= REGISTRO PESSOAL =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Almost everyone has been evacuated from the space station now. The rest of us are leaving in a couple of days, once our research has been completed.
dialogue.translation: Quase todos já foram evacuados da estação espacial. O resto de nós vai partir em alguns dias, assim que nossa pesquisa for concluída.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Notas de Pesquisa =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...everything collapses, eventually. It's the way of the universe.
dialogue.translation: ... tudo desmorona, no fim. É o destino do universo.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I wonder if the generator we set up in the polar dimension is what's affecting our teleporters?
dialogue.translation: Será que o gerador que montamos na dimensão polar é o que tá afetando nossos teletransportadores?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: No, it's probably just a glitch.
dialogue.translation: Não, deve ser só uma falha.

cutscene.explanation: a trinket that's difficult to get

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= REGISTRO PESSOAL =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Hah! Nobody will ever get this one.
dialogue.translation: Rá! Ninguém nunca vai conseguir esse.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...The other day I was chased down a hallway by a giant cube with the word AVOID on it.
dialogue.translation: ... Outro dia fui perseguido por um corredor por um cubo gigante com a palavra EVITAR.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: These security measures go too far!
dialogue.translation: Essas medidas de segurança estão indo longe demais!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: The only way into my private lab anymore is by teleporter.
dialogue.translation: A única maneira de entrar no meu laboratório particular é por teletransporte.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've made sure that it's difficult for unauthorised personnel to gain access.
dialogue.translation: Eu fiz questão de que seja difícil para as pessoas não autorizadas obterem acesso.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Notas de Pesquisa =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... our first breakthrough was the creation of the inversion plane, which creates a mirrored dimension beyond a given event horizon ...
dialogue.translation: ... nosso primeiro avanço foi a criação do plano de inversão, que cria uma dimensão espelhada além de um determinado horizonte de eventos...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Notas de Pesquisa =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...with just a small modification to the usual parameters, we were able to stabilise an infinite tunnel!
dialogue.translation: ... com apenas uma pequena modificação nos parâmetros normais, conseguimos estabilizar um túnel infinito!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Notas de pesquisa =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... the final step in creating the dimensional stabiliser was to create a feedback loop ...
dialogue.translation: ... a etapa final na criação do estabilizador dimensional foi criar um loop de feedback...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Notas de Pesquisa =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...despite our best efforts, the dimensional stabiliser won't hold out forever. Its collapse is inevitable...
dialogue.translation: ... apesar dos nossos melhores esforços, o estabilizador dimensional não vai durar pra sempre. Seu colapso é inevitável...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Huh? These coordinates aren't even in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Hm? Essas coordenadas nem estão nesta dimensão!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Personal Log =-
dialogue.translation: -= Registro Pessoal =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... I've had to seal off access to most of our research. Who knows what could happen if it fell into the wrong hands? ...
dialogue.translation: ... Tive que bloquear o acesso à maior parte de nossa pesquisa. Quem sabe o que poderia acontecer se caísse nas mãos erradas?...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Notas de Pesquisa =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... access to the control center is still possible through the main atmospheric filters ...
dialogue.translation: ... o acesso ao centro de controle ainda é possível através dos principais filtros atmosféricos...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... it turns out the key to stabilising this dimension was to create a balancing force outside of it!
dialogue.translation: ... acontece que a chave pra estabilizar esta dimensão era criar uma força de equilíbrio fora dela!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Though it looks like that's just a temporary solution, at best.
dialogue.translation: Se bem que, na melhor das hipóteses, essa solução é apenas temporária.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've been working on something more permanent, but it seems it's going to be too late...
dialogue.translation: Ando trabalhando em alguma coisa mais permanente, mas parece que será tarde demais...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ?SYNTAX ERROR
dialogue.translation: ?ERRO DE SINTAXE

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Now that the ship is fixed, we can leave anytime we want!
dialogue.translation: Agora que a nave tá consertada, podemos partir quando quisermos!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We've all agreed to keep exploring this dimension, though.
dialogue.translation: No entanto, todos concordamos em continuar explorando essa dimensão.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Who knows what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: Quem sabe o que vamos encontrar?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= SHIP RADIO =-
[ Status ] Broadcasting
dialogue.translation:
-= RÁDIO DA NAVE =-
[ Situação ] Transmissão

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
The Super-Gravitron is intended for entertainment purposes only.
dialogue.translation:
-= ATENÇÃO =-
O Super Gravitron destina-se apenas para fins de entretenimento.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Anyone found using the Super Gravitron for educational purposes may be asked to stand in the naughty corner.
dialogue.translation: Pode ser solicitado que qualquer pessoa encontrada usando o Super Gravitron para fins educacionais fique no cantinho do castigo.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= D.S.S. SOULEYE =-
Ship Navigation Controls
dialogue.translation:
-= D.S.S. SOULEYE =-
Controles de Navegação da Nave

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Error! Error! Cannot isolate dimensional coordinates! Interference detected!
dialogue.translation: Erro! Erro! Não é possível isolar as coordenadas dimensionais! Interferência detectada!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: ...oh, I've already found this.
dialogue.translation: ... ah, eu já encontrei isso.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Please disable invincibility and/or slowdown before entering the Super Gravitron.
dialogue.translation: Desative a invencibilidade e/ou desaceleração antes de entrar no Super Gravitron.
